definitions.text: the work of providing treatment for or attending to someone or something
examples: the old car needs constant attention

definitions.text: judiciousness in avoiding harm or danger
examples: he exercised caution in opening the door
he handled the vase with care
they hushed it up out of fear of public reaction
his major care was the illness of his wife

definitions.text: attention and management implying responsibility for safety
examples: he is in the care of a bodyguard

definitions.text: activity involved in maintaining something in good working order
examples: he wrote the manual on car care
I really care about my work
The nurse was caring for the wounded

definitions.text: prefer or wish to do something
examples: Do you care to try this dish?
Would you like to come along to the movies?

definitions.text: be in charge of, act on, or dispose of
examples: I can deal with this crew of workers
She managed her parents' affairs after they got too old
